ygData.subject: Re: Hate List + hand-to-hand + Brass + fun with slaves + where to sho p  next
ygData.msgSnippet: (Mr. Griffin, Mr Sand Giant, Mr. Hill ... By the way, Who the hell is this Murissa Sandwhisperer person?  I was jaunting back to Freeport after killing some
ygData.messageBody:
(Mr. Griffin, Mr Sand Giant, Mr. Hill
> Giant, Froon and Choon, Ogre Village, Dorn, Dvinn and I still con that
> Sandwhipserer Wench as red!)

By the way,

Who the hell is this Murissa Sandwhisperer person? I was jaunting back to
Freeport after killing some crocs the other day and assumed she was a vendor
(like in E. Commons, where they are consistently not in the inns but rather
in front of them or on top of them....still haven't figured that out yet)
and she screamed something at me just before she quadruple whacked me for
127hp per slap. I have removed Dorn from my list now though....hehe it was
with a group and we almost died but I still feel better. Oh yes, add the
spectres to that list as well and a PC Dark Elf caster Xcelsior who trained
them on us about 10 times the other day. I personally only died twice. One
guy in my group had bound himself just far enough down the beach so that
after they killed him the each time, he appeared right in front of them as
they came back down the beach. He died 6 times in a space of 10 minutes
(with zoning to starting point) poor guy. It was however rather fun to
watch them kill two sand giants and Lockjaw before they finally stayed home
for good. Leaving a string of 40 bodies along the beach, was not pretty,
nor was the ensuing spam fest that went on afterwards. Oh yeah add all the
troll guards at the entrance to Grobb too. I owe them 3 lives, long story.

Weiland of Freeport
Bard of the 16th chorus
Erollisi Marr
